name: Cheater's Inn
description:
This is my submission for the AI & Game Jam 2021.

Play a card game where each AI opponent is a neural network that was trained to play by a different set of rules. Whenever you have the highest or the lowest hand, you can accuse your fellow players of cheating. Opponents that are correctly identified can be defeated and someone else will take their place. Unmask enough opponents to reach the boss battle!
